messages.title: THE FACTS ABOUT THE TORY PLAN:
messages.content: Cut Child Benefit, leaving 4 million families over £1,000 worse off. Cut Tax Credits, making over 4 million families worse off. Scrap Tax Credits entirely for parents with two children and a joint income over £29,000.

messages.title: LABOUR HAS A BETTER PLAN:
messages.content: Protect Child Benefit. Raise Tax Credits in line with inflation every year. Increase the Minimum Wage to £8 an hour. Guarantee 25 hours free childcare.

messages.title: YOUR CHILD BENEFIT IS ON THE BALLOT PAPER TOMORROW.
messages.content: The Tories' cuts to Child Benefit will cost 4 million families over £1,000 a year.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Raise Tax Credits in line with inflation every year
Increase the Minimum Wage to £8 an hour

mentions.tacticalSituation: Staying at home or voting for any other party risks letting the Tories in.

issues.socialWelfare: Working families can’t afford five more years of the Tories. Stay at home or voting for any other party risks letting the Tories in. Vote Labour to put working families first.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet focuses on the Labour Party's stance on social welfare, specifically regarding Child Benefit and Tax Credits, contrasting with the Tory plan.
